parameters.name: Lower_Rate_Limit
parameters.description: Lower pacing rate limit. Heart rate cannot fall below this value; used to calculate timing cycles (RR = 60000/LRL ms).

parameters.name: Upper_Rate_Limit
parameters.description: Upper pacing rate limit. Restricts maximum pacing frequency.

parameters.name: Atrial_Amplitude
parameters.description: Atrial pacing pulse voltage amplitude, determines stimulation intensity.

parameters.name: Atrial_Pulse_Width
parameters.description: Atrial pacing pulse width, combined with amplitude determines energy delivery.

parameters.name: ARP
parameters.description: Atrial Refractory Period: Used in AAI to ignore signals post-pacing and prevent false triggering.

parameters.name: VRP
parameters.description: Ventricular Refractory Period: Used in VVI to ignore T-waves etc. and prevent false sensing.
